skins.shipDescription: Pensacola-class Heavy Cruiser ¨C Pensacola, Hull Number CA-24!
skins.selfIntroduction: OKOK, self-introduction time, right? I'm Pensacola, I have a little sister named Salt Lake City¡­ Uh, what else do I even say when introducing myself? I helped out Hornet and Yorktown, but there's not much to say about that¡­ Oh well, anyway, let me handle everything and it'll be OK!
skins.acquisition: Are you the commander of this fleet? Why, I'd say you look pretty reliable! ¡­ OKOK, I'm Pensacola, from now on I'll follow your orders. Nice to meet you!
skins.login: Anything you need help with, Commander? I'm OK with helping you out any time!
skins.details: Maintenance? OK, tell me if you notice anything weird.
skins.secretaryIdle1: I've got the same nickname as Enterprise... Pretty cool, huh?
skins.secretaryIdle2: If you're tired, get some rest! Don't push yourself. If you ever want help, don't be shy to ask!
skins.secretaryIdle3: Though I may look like this, I've seen quite a few battles. Wanna hear about them? OK, then let's start from the beginning...
skins.secretaryTouch: I'm always OK with heading out on a sortie~
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: H-hey, that's not at all what this gesture means!
